1960 in a village in southern France. A group of boys, aged 7 to 14 years, is led by Lebrac (Vincent Bres) in a war against children from the neighboring village. It is a battle traditionally held by young generations ago the two villages. They fight for honor and loyalty, but use up the resources necessary to win. The small army of men trying all ways be missed by parents, which is complicated when they come home with torn clothes and no buttons.
